name: MAIN STREET LOAN FUND
sampleDescriptions: Building relationships with the US Department of Housing & Urban Development and the US Community Development Financial Institutions Fund.
Lobbied for Affordable Housing and Home Ownership funds to be included in the Build Back Better (Reconciliation) Act.
